title: Getting Started with Web Development
content: In this blog, I share my journey of learning web development, starting with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and then moving to React and Next.js.

title: Why I Built This Portfolio
content: This blog explains how I created my portfolio project using Next.js and TailwindCSS as part of my college club task.

title: My Future Learning Goals
content: I plan to learn backend development, APIs, and cloud computing to become a full-stack developer in the future.
